p: The gold standard for vaccine efficacy is protection against challenge. Mice immunized with a single dose of 10 10 or 10 8 vp of Ad5-mosaic, Ad5-A/PR/8/34, Ad5-Pdm09, Fluzone, or PBS were challenged with sub-lethal or 100MLD 50 of mouse-adapted IAV. Challenged mice were monitored daily for weight loss and humanely sacrificed if more than 25% initial body weight was lost.
